title: help to learn webrtc clearly
body:
by **rsandhya3dec**: 
Hi.. Im a new learner to webrtc..
I will be greatful if someone clarify my doubt..
how does ice agent send stun request using sdp ice-ufrag?

I got this doubt mainly because while creating peerconnection we use stun and turn but
session description is known only after icecandidate pair is obtained.
So how it will create the stun request and obtain the server-reflexive address?

Thanks in advance
sandhya
